CCG is a global branding, technology and digital marketing agency based in Los Angeles, CA. 
We understand the world is changing daily and being innovative takes serious focus. We work with dynamic brands to create the identity, products and campaigns to tap into changing technologies, business models, demographics and global trends. Having worked with over 500 companies globally including branding for FCancer, mobile apps for Beats by Dre, demand generation for IBM, and social media & digital marketing for hundreds of companies from startups to Fortune50 brands. 
Let us help you take your business to the next level.
We unlock the unlimited potential in your people, products and brand.
